{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Compex AP.CP01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 2×2 11ax MU-MIMO Dual Band Embedded Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://compex.com.sg/shop/embedded-board/802-11ax/cp01-2/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Compex_CP01 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Compex |model = CP01 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = C1 |subrevision = (IPQ6018) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless embedded board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ6018; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.8 GHz 1.8 GHz (+ 2x NPU @1.5GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NOR |fla2chip = Macronix;; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Aquantia;AQR109; |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8075; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, micro SD Card slot |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 12-pin header,, |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, DBDC, DFS, HE80, VHT80, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad1ax = 1201 |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 574 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *2×2 11ax MU-MIMO Dual Band Embedded Board :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ6018 802.11ax Reference Design :''[[Qualcomm Atheros]] AP.CP01 reference design'' :''See also: [http://www.bitswrt.com/nhx6018.html BitsWRT NHX6018]''
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/qualcomm-networking-pro-400-platform IPQ6018] @1.8GHz Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A53) :Flash: 32MB (NOR)/256MB (NAND)/micro SD Card slot :RAM: 1GB (2x 512MB) - 2x RAM (DDR3L) System Memory *LAN: 1x 2.5Gbps Ethernet port, WAN/LAN: 5x GbE ports *1x Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2, Key E) slots, 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 ports *WLAN: Transmit power (per chain): 23dBm (2.4GHz)/20dBm (5GHz) :2×2 On-board 2.4GHz radio, up to 574 Mbps physical data rate :2×2 On-board 5GHz radio, up to 1.2 Gbps physical data rate :Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS)
==Pictures== <center>'''[https://compex.com.sg/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/cp01.png PCB image on '''Compex''']''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Compex AP.CP01.png|CP01 PCB top </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :;[[Compex]] • [https://compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Wireless embedded board] *[[Compex AP-DK03]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 *[[Compex AP148]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 *[[Compex CP01]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6018 *[[Compex CP03]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6000 *[[Compex HK01]](.1) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8074 *[[Compex HK01.2]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8074A *[[Compex WPQ872]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A *[[Compex WPQ873]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A
